mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart_list WHERE user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_list(user_id, is_login_user, created_at, updated_at) VALUES(#{userId}, #{isLoginUser}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE cart_list SET updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart_list WHERE is_login_user = FALSE
